body_html: Generation issues aside, RoiPooling is hardcoded to work with float tensor only https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/native/NativeFunctions.cpp#L305-L311 (similar stuff in cuda implementation).
body_text: Generation issues aside, RoiPooling is hardcoded to work with float tensor only https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/native/NativeFunctions.cpp#L305-L311 (similar stuff in cuda implementation).
body: Generation issues aside, RoiPooling is hardcoded to work with float tensor only https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/native/NativeFunctions.cpp#L305-L311 (similar stuff in cuda implementation).
